Description: This is the correct entity to use as the teleport destination entity of a [trigger_teleport](../trigger_teleport). Although other entities such as [info_target](../info_target) can be used as a target as well, only info_teleport_destination allows features such as triggering something on teleport. Setting entity name to displacer_global_target allows for weapon_displacer secondary fire to have players teleport to this info_teleport_destination, if the displacer does not have "Teleport Destination" (m_iszTeleportDestination).

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of info_teleport_destination so [trigger_teleport](../trigger_teleport) can set it as it's target.
Entity to trigger when player is teleported to this point, requires "Trigger on Arrival" flag enabled. Trigger use-type is 'Toggle'.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If ticked, info_teleport_destination will trigger it's target whenever an entity is teleported here. The entity is passed as !activator to the info_teleport_destination's target.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Delay before this destination can be used again after someone landed here.
